Description:
WOW! Your Future Oasis Awaits!
### UNDER CONTRACT ###
Located precisely 4.9km from the corner of Starling Rd and Princes Hwy, it's absolutely stunning in every way! Just over 20 acres of natural bushland that undoubtedly will be converted into one magical home environment (STCA) and end up being one of the premiere properties for miles. The only piece of the puzzle missing is you!
Complete with its very own creek running through the middle of the property and in the most convenient of locations, you will literally be minutes from the Princes Hwy , shopping centres and public transport into the city.
This has to be the greatest value on offer in Officer, with genuine vendors looking to sell you will need to act fast!

Description:
Low maintenance home in desirable location
Vendor motivated to SELL!
Investors, FHB or downsizers seeking quality modern home in quiet sunny setting. This is the one for you.
Modern home with elegant finishes allowing lifestyle ease & low maintenance living. Boasting quality finishes throughout, private north facing alfresco & single car garage, this home is smartly designed on a boutique lot (individual title).
Flowing design from entrance opens to central living areas & kitchen, sliding door access to private outdoor courtyard - perfect for entertaining. Modern kitchen appliances, rear set laundry with access to a second outdoor area.
Queen sized bedrooms with robes are positioned for privacy, layout allows a dedicated bathroom for each. From the living area, hallway passage to a second bedroom, main bathroom plus powder room with basin. Master bedroom with en-suite & WIR.
Nestled into a quiet leafy street just minutes from schools, transport & community assets. Lifestyle ease within a short drive to the Geelong CBD, Waterfront or all the Bellarine has to offer. A smart purchase for the savvy buyer - First home owners, Investors & Downsizers.
Appraised rental return $17,680 per annum
Individual title (No Body Corporate fees!)
** PLEASE CONTACT AGENT FOR A PRIVATE INSPECTION **
Insights: First listed on 20 October, this house has been on Domain for 1 day. It was last sold in 2011 and 6 other 2 bedroom house in Whittington have recently been sold.

Description:
The Land of Opportunity Live In, Rent Out or Develop
Contact agent to book a private inspection or virtual tour.
Here is a fabulous opportunity for a motivated buyer to reap the rewards of this property in high growth suburb of the ever-popular Geelong. This solidly built brick home boasts ample options to buy as an investment with an estimated rental return of $330 - $340 per week or move in and enjoy as is, or apply your vision to sub-divide or develop (STCA).
Presenting three bedrooms with built in robes. Open kitchen and dining with breakfast bar, gas cooktop, electric oven and a separate light filled lounge with original floorboards, split system heating and cooling plus a gas heater. Finishing off the inside is the updated bathroom with shower, single vanity and separate bathroom.
Step outside to the undercover entertaining area that looks out onto the generous rear yard providing a great space for the kids and pets alike. Car accommodation is well catered for with ample off-street parking and plenty of space to build a garage or shed. And for those with a caravan or boat, there is storage available in both the front and rear yards with convenient side gate drive-thru access.
All of this on an approximately 733m2 allotment! Comfort and space form a wonderful combination throughout this private, quiet court location. Enjoy the convenience of neighbouring schools, and within walking distance to public transport, shops including Newcomb Centro shopping centre, Splashdown, St Albans football ground as well as plenty of parks and walking tracks close by.
Roncon Real Estate Always ON!

Description:
On the edge of town
Situated only 5 minutes from Geelong CBD, walking distance to local shops, schools, Gordan Tafe college and public transport this property is sure to appeal to first home buyers and investors, with a potential rental income of $370/week.
Comprising a central hallway, formal lounge with gas heater and split system AC, updated kitchen/dining with gas cooktop, electric oven and a dishwasher. The three bedrooms are all a good size and each have built in robes and ACs. The bathroom has also been updated with a shower over the bath and modern vanity, separate toilet. Outdoors is a private north facing lawn area, undercover area for entertaining, single garage and dual side drive providing plenty of offstreet parking or room to store a trailer or caravan. Allotment approximately 556sqm.
Make your enquiries today, this home has plenty to offer at an affordable price range.
All information is provided by third parties. You are advised to make your own enquiries regarding the accuracy of information relating to properties. Eastwood Andrews will not be liable for any loss resulting from any action or decision by you in reliance to information supplied.

Description:
Fantastic Value, Comfortable Living and Great Potential
With easy access to the CBD, shopping center, schools and public transport this location is sure to appeal! Whether you're looking for your first home or an investment, jumping into the rapidly moving Whittington market with this superbly located house is going to be one of the best decisions you have ever made.
This fantastic home boasts a light-filled living room and an open plan dining/kitchen area complete with electric oven, gas stoves, ample cupboard space and recently installed flooring. Three bedrooms with BIRs (one with wardrobe) are complimented by a neat bathroom with shower, bath and separate toilet. Spacious pergola and a fantastic backyard are ready to be enjoyed by all and form pride of place for any budding entertainer.
• Gas heater offering comfort throughout
• Car park and garage with plenty of storage
• Approximately 685 m2; further develop STCA
• 2 minutes walk to Whittington Primary School
• 2 minutes drive to Bellarine Village Shopping Centre
• Public transport to Geelong CBD
This is a terrific opportunity to buy - move in or rent out the choice is yours. Be quick to grab this exciting opportunity!

Description:
You Won't Find Better Than This....
**** Virtual and Private Inspections Available ****
Immaculately presented and lovingly maintained is this gem of a unit located in a secure and popular pocket of Whittington. Set amongst owner occupier unit neighbours, this presents an enticing opportunity to acquire this amazingly low maintenance, ready to move in and enjoy residence. Having had only one owner who has loved her time in this 'home sweet home' she is now ready to pass it onto a lucky new home owner.
This exceptional three-bedroom home offers secure and spacious living for those seeking to downsize or for those wanting to take their first step into the property market. Also, a promising prospect for the savvy investor to reap a healthy rental return of approximately $330 per week.
The flowing floor plan includes three large bedrooms with built in robes that share the functional central bathroom. The open floor plan makes for easy living, with the light filled dining area and living zone perfectly working alongside the kitchen with pantry, breakfast bar, gas cooktop and gas oven.
Fully featured with a gas heater, single remote controlled secure carport with side gate access from the front yard to the neat rear private backyard with manicured gardens and plenty of space for a green thumb to tinker around.
Just a short walk to local shopping centres, five-minute walk to Primary schools, Secondary schools, day care, medical facilities and bus stops a stone's throw away. This location delivers all you could want and need at your doorstep. Perfectly set just minutes from central Geelong and a blissful short drive to all that the Bellarine Peninsula has to offer.
This comfortable and cosy three bedder won't last too long!
Home Owner I have loved the size of the garden and the proximity to having everything within walking distance.
Roncon Real Estate Always ON

Description:
Solid Family Home on 690m2 (approx)
This neatly presented home boasts spacious rooms throughout and is a fantastic opportunity for a growing family or investor looking to secure an affordable home. Situated on an impressive 690sqm (approx.), it's only a short drive to the Newcomb Shopping Centre and a host of convenient amenities.
The home features beautiful slate flooring, four generous size bedrooms, three with built-in robes, ceiling fans throughout, a lounge-dining area with large windows letting in an abundance of natural light complete with a cosy gas log fire and split-system air-conditioning, a functional timber kitchen with 5 burner gas cook-top and stunning 40mm stone bench tops which provide plenty of space for lovers of cooking, central bathroom with large timber vanity, shower, bath and separate toilet, a sizable laundry with an abundance of storage, the meals area leads outside to a large covered alfresco area which is the perfect space for family barbeques, a sizable backyard for the kids to play, landscaped gardens, two water tanks and even a cubbyhouse! The driveway leads to an extra-large single garage with workshop plus an additional storage area behind the garage, making it ideal for tradies.
With handy positioning close to the Newcomb and Bellarine Village Shopping Centres, schools, parks, public transport and only a short drive into the Geelong CBD, take advantage of this exciting opportunity today!

Description:
Perfect Starting Point With Potential on 687m2
ON The Market
Inspect by appointment only**
The perfect starting point to enter into Geelong's forever growing property market!
Set on a approximately 687m2 block of land, this well-maintained stand-alone brick home offers an amazing opportunity to simply enjoy as is, or further enhance to your liking.
The flowing floorplan consists of three generous sized bedrooms, spacious lounge with gas heating, well-appointed kitchen with dishwasher, and separate dining area with split system heating and cooling. The bathroom and laundry are fit and functional for a family, with the added advantage of the shower and toilet each separate from the main bathroom. Outside there is a generous undercover pergola built for entertaining, plus a large backyard providing plenty of space for kids and pets alike to enjoy.
This property offers an impressive large double driveway with single carport and access to the backyard with ample space for additional cars, a boat or caravan. The double lock up garage and an additional shed will be sure to excite those who love to tinker, or are looking for additional storage space.
Located within easy access to transport and shops including, Newcomb Centro shopping centre, Splashdown Leisure Centre, St Albans football ground, as well as plenty of parks and walking tracks close by.
Whether you are looking to enter the property market, or wanting to start or add to your investment portfolio this home is a winner! With a current rental return of $330 per week, and the potential for this tenant to stay on long term - this property offers impressive options with endless advantages.
Roncon Real Estate Always ON!

Description:
Calling all first home buyers, growing families and Investors
This property could be the idyllic addition to your rental portfolio. Also for those wanting to get into the market this could be your perfect first home set on a massive 840m2 allotment.
As you enter the light filled home you are greeted with a formal lounge that flows onto the open plan kitchen/dining area.
With generous bench space, dishwasher and corner pantry, the kitchen/dining/living ties in perfectly leading out to the alfresco area with north facing low maintenance garden.
Comprising of three good sized bedrooms, all with built in robes and easy access to the family bathroom incorporating a bath, shower and separate toilet.
Heating and cooling is accounted for with reverse cycle split system, gas ducted heating ensuring comfort all year round.
The 7m x 5.7m garage with remote control door and extra 7.3m x 4.8m garaging to the rear with water tank are additional features to this home. Further parking off street for 3 cars is also accommodated for.
Conveniently located only ten minutes to the Geelong CBD, minutes to local shops and public transport, this location is sure to appeal.
- 3 Bedroom Family Home
- 2 separate living areas
- A/C Split System and Gas Heating
- 840m2
- Potential Rent $360 pw
- Undercover outdoor pergola
-11 Solar panels
- Close to Schools, Shops & Transport

Located close by to local schools, the Bellarine Shopping Centre, medical facilities and public transport right at your door. This is truly one opportunity too good to miss! Call to inspect today.

Description:
A True Lifestyle Property At A Great Price!
Quite simply you wont find better value for money than this meticulously presented family home in the hottest suburb in Geelong. Set on a spacious allotment of approximately 679 square metre, this stunning renovation is complete from the low maintenance gardens right down to the exquisite fixtures and fittings in the bathroom. From the moment you walk in you can feel the warmth permeating through this home with a sunken living room leading to the kitchen and meals area and a versatile formal dining room that could also be transformed into study or home office with ease. The beautifully appointed kitchen will impress even the most discerning of judges with stone bench tops, stainless steel appliances including dishwasher, electric oven, gas cook top and range hood plus plenty of storage and bench space and pantry. All 3 bedrooms are generous in size with wall to wall carpet in all rooms built-in robes and are fitted with double blinds while the feature wall in the main bedroom has to be viewed to be truly appreciated.
Intelligently designed to make the most of the space provided the central bathroom comes with separate bath and shower, floor to ceiling tiling plus single vanity and in keeping with the neutral tones of the rest of the home is simple yet classy in how it has been presented. Additional extras include reverse cycle heating and cooling in the living room, stunning floating floors through the living and dining area and downlights right throughout.
Outside is where this exquisite property comes into its own with 3 undercover areas including built in spa and deck plus a fire pit and semi-circle bench that will make you the envy of family and friends as youll be able to entertain all year round in privacy and comfort no matter the weather. The 2 car garage and workshop area is set up to entertain and comes complete with built in wood heater and room to put the TV on the wall and really make the most of those Winter Friday nights!
Within walking distance to schools, shops, Buckleys entertainment centre, St. Albans oval and Gordon TAFE and with public transport located close by this fantastic family home sets up as a central location for the family on the go and would work perfectly as an investment property with a solid approximate rental return of $390 a week and nothing left to do other than move into it!
Make the time to view this outstanding home and you will not be disappointed. Inspection will impress and if you miss out another substantial home in this price bracket may not come up again.

- Both bedrooms boast b/in robes and courtyard access

- Remote single lock-up garage features internal access
- Currently leased to an excellent tenant until 11 June, 2020

Located in a quiet court location & set on a great allotment of approx 645sqm is this immaculate family home that offers a surprising amount of space!
Presenting a large master bedroom, with built in Robe, 2 additional bedrooms (with BIRs in 1 ) a conveniently located fully renovated family bathroom, spacious front lounge & large dining area. Description:
Low maintenance living awaits
This modern home encompasses lifestyle with low maintenance living in a functional layout, nestled into a quiet leafy street, minutes from Schools, transport, shops & medical facilities. Boasting rear alfresco with generous lawn backyard & off street parking this home is well positioned on a boutique lot (individual title). A smart purchase for any buyer - First home buyers, Young Families, Investors & Downsizers.
Flowing design provides direct access from the entrance hallway to bedrooms, garage, bathroom, toilet, laundry & open plan kitchen, living & alfresco. Forward of the living areas are two generous bedrooms both with ceiling fans, BIR, separated by a centrally located bathroom & toilet. Open dining & carpeted lounge meet a spacious modern kitchen design for functional ease with ample cupboard storage, quality oven & dishwasher. Living area includes a centrally positioned split system aircon/heating able to service the whole house, sliding doors opening onto enclosed alfresco & sunbathed lawn backyard perfect for entertaining & a secure play area for younger children.
Simple living all within a short drive to the Geelong City, Waterfront & all the Bellarine has to offer. This homes' simple lifestyle is one to experience for yourself

Description:
Live in or Rent Out
** Call or email to register for a private inspection **
Located at the end of a quiet court, this home offers 3 BRs, open plan living kitchen/meals/area, central bathroom with separate wc and laundry. Set on a 621m2block, the property has a large rear yard with garage and combined workshop. Situated a short distance to local shops and schools, hop skip and a jump away from the Geelong CBD or a 20-minute drive to see some of Victoria's most famous beaches. The property needs some TLC but is a great entry level home that is perfect for first home buyers or investors.
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Scarborough Circa-1880 Residence In Convenient Locale!
Steeped in history, this circa-1880 residence presents a rare opportunity on approx. 842m2! The generous backyard is wonderfully private, while the double garage and workshops will instantly appeal to tradies!
When it comes to convenient locations, this one has it all. Public transport is footsteps away, while the Bellarine Highway shopping centres will leave you wanting nothing. Whittington Primary School and Geelong East Primary School are moments away, while Newcomb Secondary College is within close reach. Enjoy easy access to the Gordon Tafe's East Geelong Campus, St Albans Reserve sporting grounds, and Buckley's Entertainment Centre.
Built on bluestone foundations, 'Scarborough' was the original farmhouse of the area. 12ft ceilings and decorative plasterwork enrich the interiors, along with Parisian stained-glass windows. The formal lounge is graced with a gas log fireplace and a large sash window opening onto the wrap-around verandah. Complete with a built-in bar, this room is also ideal for entertaining loved ones. The open plan living/dining/kitchen zone unites with the sheltered rear deck for casual living. The kitchen is equipped with a built-in pantry, dishwasher, and cooking appliances.
The Master Bedroom features built-in robes and an en suite. Two additional bedrooms with built-in robes (one with fireplace) share close access to the main bathroom. The study, laundry, and powder room complete the layout. Other features inc. ducted heating/cooling, split-system air conditioner, security cameras, and artificial grass to the front yard. Established trees and gardens surround the backyard, which is home to a greenhouse and garden shed. The double carport and double garage provide ample parking, while the two workshops will impress.
Offering a slice of Geelong's history in a convenient location, this rare opening is not to be missed! Enquire today!
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
Perfect Little Entertainer
** Call or email to register for a private inspection **
Searching for a low-maintenance property in a prime location? This two-bedroom home is ideal for first home owners, downsizers or investors and is perfectly positioned in a quiet pocket only moments from schools, parks and the centre of Geelong. The open-plan kitchen, living and dining zone has a wall of windows which draws natural light into the home while split system air-conditioning and gas heating are also on offer. The kitchen is presented in great condition and features a gas stove, a dual oven and ample bench space and cupboards for added convenience. Each bedroom has a built-in robe while the bathroom features a shower, separate bath and toilet. An oversized single garage and laundry complete the floorplan. Outside the paved undercover entertaining area set of the living space is perfect for enjoying the quiet surrounds or hosting guests. The easy access to Newcomb Central Shopping Centre Bellarine Village, transport links, parks and the Geelong CBD further add to the convenience on offer.
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Opportunity + Potential = Prosperous Possibilities . .
ON The Market
Virtual inspections & Private inspections available on request, contact Jess to book in a time.
Roncon Real Estate presents an enticing and engaging opportunity that is sure to excite investors, developers and first home buyers alike. This character home is set on an abundant 737m2 of land and is located in a quiet street of the increasingly popular, Whittington.
The home includes two bedrooms with built in robes, a spacious and functional living / dining zone with timber flooring flowing throughout. The central bathroom comprises bath, shower and single vanity. The well-designed kitchen has an abundance of storage with a lovely leafy backyard outlook. All of this, plus a vast rear yard coupled with an undercover outdoor entertaining area, garage and lush leafy vegetation is sure to surprise and delight!
Fully featured with gas heating plus split system heating and cooling.
This pocket of Whittington is private, family friendly and conveniently positioned within walking distance to shopping centres, local schools, Gordon Institute of TAFE East Geelong Campus, a short 10-minute drive to Central Geelong and within easy access to all that the Bellarine Peninsula has to offer.
Potential to extend, subdivide, demolish and redevelop the entire site (STCA), the opportunity is here now. With all the potential and possibilities, this home wont last long.
Roncon Real Estate Always ON!
